[TABLE from 1. Annual Report 2023-24.pdf, Page 5]
                                                                                         0                                                                                1                             2                      3
                                                                                                                                                             The Foundation                                                     
                                                                                         T he sponsoring body of the University – the Foundation for Advancement of Science                                                     
                                                                           and  Technology                                                         (FAST)  was  established           in  1980. \nIt \nis registered  with \nthe
Government  of  Pakistan  as  a  charitable  institution.  In  1985,  it  selected  higher                                                                                                                                      
                                                                 education  as  a  vehicle                                                                       to  pursue its  objective  of  producing        scientists  and
       technologists of the highest caliber. FAST pioneered the development of IT industry                                                                                                                                      
   in  Pakistan  by  offering  the  country’s  first  undergraduate  program  in  Computer                                                                                                                                      
       Science. Today, this University, sponsored by FAST, stands recognized as the leader                                                                                                                                      
                                    and trend-setter in this field in Pakistan and abroad.                                                                                                                                      
      A Board of Governors, elected in accordance with its Charter, manages the affairs of                                                                                                                                      
    the  Foundation.  The  members  of  the  Board  are  eminent  personalities  in  their                                                                                                                                      
         respective fields and are associated with the Foundation in an honorary capacity.
